definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Toe Olympic Mascot is of 5 Fuwa, have you got any?
sentences.chinese: 奥运吉祥物由五福娃组成，您有了吗？

sentences.english: Beijing chooses five friendlies as Olympic mascots.
sentences.chinese: 北京选择了五个福娃作为奥运吉祥物。

sentences.english: Fuwa are probably the most meaningful Olympic mascots in the history.
sentences.chinese: 福娃可能是历史上最有意义的奥运吉祥物。

sentences.english: They are called Fuwa, the Beijing Olympic mascots .
sentences.chinese: 它们叫福娃，是北京奥运会的吉祥物。

sentences.english: Among the five Fuwa, in this, my favorite is called "Jingjing" and Fuwa.
sentences.chinese: 在这五个福娃当中，我最喜欢叫做“晶晶”的福娃。

sentences.english: Among the five Fuwa, in this, my favorite is called "Jingjing" and Fuwa.
sentences.chinese: 在这五个福娃当中，我最喜欢叫做“晶晶”的福娃。

sentences.english: They are Fuwa, the Beijing Olympic mascots .
sentences.chinese: 它们叫福娃，是北京奥运会的吉祥物。

sentences.english: The homophonic of five FU WA name add exactly" Peking is welcome you".
sentences.chinese: 五个福娃名字的谐音加起来正是“北京欢迎您”。

sentences.english: Students in Taowu Primary School in Suzhou, Jiangsu, think they are cute.
sentences.chinese: 江苏省苏州市桃坞中心小学的学生认为福娃好可爱。

sentences.english: I got the Friendlies for my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我得到了福娃作为我的生日礼物。

sentences.english: Read the text in details and find what are their hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 仔细阅读课文，了解文中每个福娃的喜好。

sentences.english: The word Fuwa by itself means "good-luck dolls".
sentences.chinese: 福娃一词本身意为“好运的玩偶”。

sentences.english: Fuwa Jingjing Song Ci from the head decoration of lotus petals on the form.
sentences.chinese: 福娃晶晶的头部纹饰源自宋瓷上的莲花瓣造型。

definition: Tuzki, a popular Chinese illustrated rabbit character
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
